description:
Beautiful and super peaceful for bedroom apt with high ceilings lots of space.  4 beds Queen 2 Twin and full size bed and futon in your own private apt. Two the. Full Also bath and kitchen wifi cable. Close to ACJZL. Very quiet and peaceful lovely space.

Four bedrooms private rooms w 4beds Queen full and single and also private living space w coffee table and futon sofa.  You also have complete apartment living room and bath and eatin kitchen.

Five minutes away from Broadway Junction train station a CLJZ trains
name: Super Large & Sunny 4 Bedroom
